name: Entropy (itch) (corndog)
description:
Entropy is a side scrolling 2D Platform game. Help Flight Engineer Davis escape from the Off World Laser research station on Mars. Jump, run, and Jetpack your way through 20+ action packed levels that are sure to test reflexes and patience.

- Fast paced

- 20+ action packed Levels

- Original complete Soundtrack

Developed by me as part of my BCT degree at Media Design School. Entropy is the first game I have ever made, I am very proud of what I have achieved in a short period of time. Thank you for checking it out!

Official Gameplay Trailer:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GqnCmT20Zfg&feature=youtu.be
